column4: help me please! after doing "aptitude full-upgrade" this command hangs up when it begins updatin mysql. i waited 15 minutes, closed the console and rebooted. after it, linux (ubuntu) don't react on mouse movements and key hits, and recovery console loading also hangs after "init-bottom script: done". can anyone help me to fix it?
honestly I would just do a full reinstall
i cannot, cause i cannot backup my data
